title: Bug 35156: Ctrl+F1 not working on some fields in the help search
OB: Ctrl+F1 key combination does not work on some fields in the help search.
EB: When pressing Ctrl+F1 on any field in the help search, a help pop-up screen should appear, displaying information about the selected field.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch Eclipse with Double-Byte Character Set (DBCS) locale. 
2. Select 'Search' > 'Help' from the menu bar.
3. In the Help window, click on the first text field.
4. Press Ctrl+F1.
5. Expect a help pop-up screen to appear, displaying information about the field.
Comment: 
1. This issue occurs on all DBCS languages.
2. The problem only occurs on the first text field. When cycling through the other fields using the tab key, Ctrl+F1 works properly.
3. Refer to the attached screenshot, which highlights the field that is not responding to Ctrl+F1 (circled in red), while the fields that are working properly are circled in green.
